post.text:
El Capitán Humayun Khan murió sirviendo a su país y salvando a sus compañeros.

Trump parece pensar que alguien como él no pertenece a este país.

comment.author: Hunter
comment.text: What??!! That's lies and you know it!!! You know Trump is actually talking about his plans for our country not just putting you down you have been in this game for 30YRS AND YET YOU HAVE DONE NOTHING...NOTHING YOU DON'T DESERVE TO BE PRESIDENT !!!! TRUMP 2016!!!

replies.author: Ashton
replies.text: FRANTIC insane rant!! You need a Thorazine truck parked outside your house!
